Key: (Hmmm. Is he not over here either?)
Heeeeey, Tonomachiiiiii!
Where are you, Tonomachiiii!
Are you okaaaay?! If you're here, say something!

It's no use. I don't see him anywhere.
Seriously, where did he go?
Translation: Es inútil. No lo veo por ninguna parte.  En serio, ¿a dónde se fue?

Key:
Could he really have been spirited away?
No, like that would even happen. Besides,
Tonomachi made up the whole Tengu Cow thing...
Translation: ¿Podría realmente haber sido secuestrado?  No, como si eso fuera a pasar. Además, Tonomachi se inventó lo de la vaca Tengu...

Key:
T-There's no such thing as ghosts, anyway...
Even if there were, I'm not scared at—
Translation: Los fantasmas no existen...  Incluso si los hubiera, no tengo miedo de...

Key: Yikes!
(Huh? What! Something's coming this way!)

(Huh?! What, what? What the hell is it?
It's coming this way with an intense speed?!)
Translation: (¡¿Eh?! ¿Qué, qué? ¿Qué demonios es?  ¡¿Viene hacia aquí con una velocidad intensa?!)

Key: (O-Oh crap... M-My back's gonna give out!)
I've found you!
U-Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!
W-What is the matter Shido?!
Huh? Tohka?
Hm, yes, but?

P-Phew. Please, don't scare me like that...
My heart almost jumped out of my mouth!
Translation: P-Phew. Por favor, no me asustes así...  ¡El corazón casi se me sale por la boca!

Key: Huh? I don't really understand, but I apologize.
Translation: ¿Eh? Realmente no lo entiendo, pero pido disculpas.

Key: Shido, wouldn't it be good for you to go to the hospital once?
Translation: Shido, ¿no sería bueno que fueras al hospital una vez?

Key: Huh? Why?

Your heart jumping out of your mouth
sounds like a serious medical condition.
Translation: Su corazón saltando de su boca suena como una condición médica grave.

Key: Oh, no, it's just a saying... I'm okay, really...
Translation: Oh, no, es sólo un decir... Estoy bien, de verdad...

Key: Oh, okay. If that's the case, then...
Translation: Ah, vale. Si ese es el caso, entonces...

Key: Hey, weren't you going back with the others?
Translation: Oye, ¿no ibas a volver con los otros?

Key:
Hm? Why are you asking me that? Did you not
want me to be here with you, Shido?
Translation: ¿Hm? ¿Por qué me preguntas eso? ¿No querías que estuviera aquí contigo, Shido?

Key: No, nothing like that, just...
You're all alone. What would I do if something happened to you?
Translation: Estás sola. ¿Qué haría si te pasara algo?

Key:
I-If you got spirited away... and if I was no longer
able to see you, it would, you know... be very saddening!
Translation: Si te llevaran en espiral... y si ya no pudiera verte, sería, ya sabes... ¡muy triste!

Key:
Oh, well, uh... okay, okay.
Let's search together.
Translation: Oh, bueno, eh... vale, vale.  Busquemos juntos.

Key: Yes! I believe that is the best option!
Translation: Sí, creo que es la mejor opción.

Key:
She's made it sound like Tonomachi's already been spirited
away, but... I'll just leave that alone for now.
Translation: Lo ha hecho sonar como si Tonomachi ya hubiera sido llevado, pero... Lo dejaré así por ahora.

Key: Let's try going to the other side.
Yes, alright then.
Shido?
Hm?
Aah?! T-T-T-Tohka! What's wrong?

Hm? The grass is surprisingly tall, and there's a slight fog.
With such terrible visibility, we will be separated if
we do not hold hands.
Translation: ¿Qué? La hierba es sorprendentemente alta, y hay una ligera niebla.  Con una visibilidad tan terrible, nos separaremos si no nos cogemos de la mano.

Key: R-Right... I see. Okay.
Let us go.
A-Alright...

(Tohka's hand... it's so soft and warm.
Even in this darkness, I feel reassured.)
Translation: (La mano de Tohka... es tan suave y cálida.  Incluso en esta oscuridad, me siento reconfortado).

Key: Heeeeey, Tonomachiiiiii!
Tonomachiiii! Where are yooooou?
It's no use. He's not over here either.
Hm. Shall we return?

Yeah, I think that's a good idea.
Should we head back and give our offerings first?
Translation: Sí, creo que es una buena idea.  ¿Deberíamos volver y dar nuestras ofrendas primero?

Key: Yes!
Eeeeek!
Mm!
T-T-Tohka, this isn't... no!
It's fine. I do not mind.
What?

Y-You were scared, yes?
You could not help yourself.

So, um... if you... really wanted this, Shido...
we can stay like this a little longer...
Translation: Así que... si... realmente querías esto, Shido... podemos quedarnos así un poco más...

Key: Er, no, I'm fine now, so...
Translation: Er, no, estoy bien ahora, así que...

Key: Rr! J-Just do it!
Ack! T-Tohka?!
Oogh!
How is it, Shido? Do you feel calmer?
C-Calmer? T-This is making me even more...
Translation: ¿C-Calmer? E-Esto me está haciendo aún más...

Key: Shido?
W-What?
I feel very reassured... you know?
Y-Yeah... I feel, reassured too.
We are on the same page then...
Ah! Onii-chan!

Uwaaaaahh... W-Wait... Kotori?!
What are you doing here?!

Oogh. What kind of question is that?
You were taking so long that we all
went looking for you!
Translation: Oogh. ¿Qué clase de pregunta es esa?  ¡Tardabas tanto que todos fuimos a buscarte!

Key: Oh, no! I'm sorry! We just got a little lost...
Translation: ¡Oh, no! ¡Lo siento! Nos perdimos un poco...

Key: There's no point if the search party gets lost!
Translation: No tiene sentido si el grupo de búsqueda se pierde.

Key: I'm sorry...
Well, we were able to find you guys, so it's okay but...
Translation: Bueno, pudimos encontraros, así que está bien pero...

Key:
(Ah... I can't really say that I completely forgot about
Tonomachi...)
Translation: (Ah... En realidad no puedo decir que me haya olvidado por completo de Tonomachi...)

Key: Hmm...by the way, what were you two doing just now?
Translation: Hmm... por cierto, ¿qué estabais haciendo hace un momento?

Key:
Huh?! We weren't doing anything!
Right, Tohka?!
Y-Yes! We were doing nothing!
Hmmm... Well, whatever.
Alright, let's hurry and leave an offering, then go home!
Translation: ¡Muy bien, démonos prisa, dejemos una ofrenda y volvamos a casa!

Key: Yes, y-you are right! L-Let's go, Shido!
Y-Yeah!

Still... I wonder what Tonomachi's doing...
Just where is he? Ugh...
Translation: Aún así... Me pregunto que estará haciendo Tonomachi...  ¿Dónde está? Ugh...
